closes #<ISSUE_NUMBER>

# Submitter

- [ ] All issue checkboxes checked
- [ ] PR title: `<Issue Title> <Issue Number>`
- [ ] Add "closes #<ISSUE_NUMBER>" at top
- [ ] Add labels
- [ ] CI passes
- [ ] Add reviewers
- [ ] Notify reviewer

# Reviewer

- [ ] All issue tasks done
- [ ] Branch name matches issue
- [ ] CI passes
- [ ] Changes are minimal
- [ ] Unit tests added
- [ ] E2E tests added

## After Approval

- [ ] Approve (e.g. LGTM)
- [ ] Notify submitter and admin
- [ ] Merge PR (if admin)
- [ ] Write praise
